00008 class CircularProbe : public Probe
00009 {       
00010 protected:
00011   
00012   double _x,_y,_R;
00013   
00014 public:
00015   
00016   CircularProbe() _x(0.0), _y(0.0), _R(1.0) { }
00017   CircularProbe(double x, double y, double R) _x(x), _y(y), _R(R) { }
00018   ~CircularProbe() { }
00019   
00020   bool containCenter (body2d * b)
00021   {
00022     double dx = b->x() - _x;
00023     double dy = b->y() - _y;
00024     return ( (dx*dx + dy*dy) < _R*_R);
00025   }
00026   
00027   bool contain (inter2d * k)
00028   {
00029     double dx = k->x() - _x;
00030     double dy = k->y() - _y;
00031     return ( (dx*dx + dy*dy) < _R*_R);
00032   }

00035 };
